abstract: Esther Freud’s new novel Lucky Break focuses on three actors as it explores the frustrations and occasional joys of pursuing an acting career.
snippet: Esther Freud’s new novel, “Lucky Break,” focuses on three actors as it explores the frustrations and occasional joys of an acting career.
lead_paragraph: Esther Freud’s new novel, “Lucky Break,” focuses on three actors as it explores the frustrations and occasional joys of an acting career.

headline.main: That Hour Upon the Stage and the Pain Getting There
headline.print_headline: That Hour Upon the Stage And the Pain Getting There
headline.seo: Esther Freud’s ‘Lucky Break’ Explores the Actor’s Life
